author: norman
msg: Revert fix i commited for heloname usage in RemoteDelivery. This fix is not needed cause its possible to set the heloname with <mail.smtp.localhost>some.host.name</mail.smtp.localhost> . Backport needed changes from trunk. (Thx Stefano for reporting). See JAMES-735

author: norman
